title: Two discourses concerning the Holy Spirit, and His work the one, Of the Spirit as a comforter, the other, As He is the author of spiritual gifts ... / by ... John Owen.
author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.
notes: Errata: prelim. p. [8] and p. cxiv at end.
Added t.p. on p. [103]: A discourse of spiritual gifts.
"The application of the foregoing discourse" (caption title): p. ciii-cxiv.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
